actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act and the Solid Waste Disposal Act in order to include the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands within the definition of the term "State."
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Includes the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands within the definition of the term State under the Clean Air Act and the Solid waste Disposal Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act and the Solid Waste Disposal Act in order to include the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands within the definition of the term "State."
